attributes.action: research digital rights management and have it removed from online music and DVD's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Digital Rights Management, is placed on all downloaded music from large record companies and some computer makers. Also DVD's have this in the form of encryption. If we PAY for this media we should have the right to use it as we please! The DRM means we cant use it on anything but only things with the correct settup. Anything we buy should be by rights ours to do with as we please (but with the limitation that we shouldnt give it on for free).
